title: Lattice-Entangled Density Wave Instability and Nonthermal Melting in La$_4$Ni$_3$O$_{10}$
summary: The recent discovery of high-temperature superconductivity in pressurized nickelates has renewed interest in the broken-symmetry states of their ambient-pressure parent phases, where a density-wave (DW) order emerges and competes with superconductivity, but its microscopic origin remains unresolved.
